name: Familiar (itch) (sssemendyaev)
description:
A short story about a cat who could easily calm down his human Jo. Go through several countryside locations to meet your old friends along the way, help them, and maybe find something special...

...There is a secret ending.

The whole story of the game is based on real life, everyday stories and the ordinary life of our feline friends.

The game is made for Mini Jam 127: Cats²

engine

Huge thanks to ledoux for such a wonderful tool as Bitsy. This is a very simple and clear tool that allows you to quickly (or not) create a virtual world. This is my first game made with this tool and wow. For me, programming is not the easiest and most understandable part of game development, but with Bitsy this issue is easily solved.
